expo.name: Dominion with Friends
expo.description: Dominion with Friends is a React-Native application based off of the popular deck building game [Dominion](https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/36218/dominion). There has been quite a saga of Dominion web-based games that were designed around the idea of playing a complete game live with others around the world. Most of these games require you to start and finish a game in one sitting. We wanted an application where you could play a game over the course of a day and play a turn when you have a moment. The best comparison is to Words with Friends, where you can invite friends to your game play with them. If you want to play a game with us, add `Maxscores` or `Umber` (the creators) and start a game!
